channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Supreme Court appears likely to uphold state bans on transgender athletes
item.description: To date, 27 states have enacted laws barring transgender participation in sports.

item.title: Director Timothy Busfield turns himself in to face child sex abuse charges in New Mexico
item.description: Director and Emmy Award-winning actor Timothy Busfield turned himself in Tuesday to authorities in New Mexico to face child sex abuse charges.

item.title: Microsoft announces glut of new data centers but says it won’t let your electricity bill go up
item.description: The tech giant has pledged to be a "good neighbor" as it continues to invest in AI infrastructure throughout the country.
